mapper.select: /* AdvertiseDAO.getAdvertiseBankDepositInfo */ select a.deposit_no , a.amount , a.bank_code , get_code_name('010', a.bank_code) as bank_name , date_format(a.deposit_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as deposit_date , a.deposit_name , a.advertise_req_no , a.comment , get_user_name(a.reg_user_no) as reg_user_name , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as reg_date , a.udp_user_no , a.udp_date , a.mapping_user_no , a.mapping_date , b.title as advertise_title , c.hakwon_name , get_user_name(c.master_user_no) as master_user_name from tb_advertise_bank_deposit a left outer join tb_advertise_req b on a.advertise_req_no = b.advertise_req_no left outer join tb_hakwon c on c.hakwon_no = b.hakwon_no where a.deposit_no = #{depositNo}

/* AdvertiseDAO.advertiseSearch */ select c.advertise_req_no , c.title , c.banner_file_no , get_file_path(c.banner_file_no) as banner_file_path , c.cancel_yn , c.deposit_yn , c.banner_size , c.price , date_format(c.reg_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') as reg_date , a.hakwon_name , get_file_path(d.logo_file_no) as hakwon_logo_path , get_user_name(a.master_user_no) as master_user_name , (select sum(total_price) from tb_advertise_req_pay_info where advertise_req_no = c.advertise_req_no) as pre_calc_price from tb_advertise_req c , tb_hakwon a , tb_hakwon_info d , tb_user_info b where (c.deposit_yn = 'N' or c.deposit_yn is null) and c.cancel_yn is null and c.hakwon_no = a.hakwon_no and c.hakwon_no = d.hakwon_no and a.master_user_no = b.user_no and ( c.title like concat('%', #{advertiseSearchText}, '%') or a.hakwon_name like concat('%', #{advertiseSearchText}, '%') or b.user_name like concat('%', #{advertiseSearchText}, '%') ) order by c.advertise_req_no asc

/* AdvertiseDAO.advertiseReqDetail */ select b.advertise_req_no , b.title , b.banner_file_no , get_file_path(b.banner_file_no) as banner_file_path , b.banner_size , b.cancel_yn , b.cancel_date , b.stop_admin_yn , b.deposit_yn , b.price , a.hakwon_name , a.hakwon_no , b.bank_info from tb_hakwon a , tb_advertise_req b where b.advertise_req_no = #{reqNo} and a.hakwon_no = b.hakwon_no

/* AdvertiseDAO.advertiseReqLocalList */ select a.advertise_req_no , a.view_month , case when date_format(now(), '%Y%m') = a.view_month then 'Y' else 'N' end as current_view , a.sido , a.gugun , a.dong , a.banner_size from tb_advertise_local_date a where a.advertise_req_no = #{reqNo} order by a.view_month asc , a.sido asc , a.gugun asc , a.dong asc

/* AdvertiseDAO.hakwonRegMonthPriceList */ select a.view_month , a.banner_size , a.price , a.dong_count , a.total_price from tb_advertise_req_pay_info a where a.advertise_req_no = #{reqNo} order by a.view_month asc
